verses.content: Tûn Nebat naupa lal Jeroboam chu kum sâwm le kum riet ân lal kum chun Judahai chungah Abijam chu ân lal ṭan a.
Jerusalem khuoah kum thum ân lal a, a nu hming chu Maaka, Abisa- lom naunu a nih.
A hmaa a pain thil suol a thawhai po po kha a thaw veh a; a pu David lungril angin a lungril chu LALPA a Pathien tienga chun a ṭha famkim ve nawh a.
Nisienlakhawm, David leiin LALPA Pathien chun ama hnunga a naupa la tungdingna ding le Jerusalem khuo inngîr det dingin Jerusalem khuoa chun khâwnvar a pêk a.
Hit mi Uria chungchâng ti nawa chun Davidin LALPA mithmua thil- ṭha a thaw hlak lei le a dam sûng poa thaw dinga thu a pêk taphawt chu a sêl ngai dêr naw leiin.
Rehoboam chu a dam sûng po chu Jeroboam leh an indo zing zing hlak a.
Abijam chanchin le a thilthaw danghai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Abijam le Jeroboam chu an indo hlak a. Chun, Abijam chu a puhai kuoma chun a in tah a, David khaw- puia chun an phûm tah a; ama aiawin a naupa Asa chu ân lal tah a.
Israel lal Jeroboam chu kum sâwmhni ân lal kum chun Asa chu Judahai chungah ân lal ṭan a.
Chun, kum sâwmli le kum khat chu Jerusalemah ân lal a, a pi hming chu Maaka, Abisalom naunu a nih.
Asa chun a pu David ang bawkin LALPA mithmua thilṭha a thaw hlak a.
Chun, pasal inzawrhai chu a rama inthawkin a hnawt suok a, a puhaiin milim an lo siemhai po po chu a sukbo vawng a.
A pi Maaka khawm chu milim tirdakumtak Asera a siempêk leiin, a lalnu nina chu a bân a; chun, Asa chun a milim siem chu a sât thlûk a, Kidron vadungah a rawh a.
Bâwlhmunhai ruok chu a sukbo nawh a, nisienlakhawm, Asa lungril chu a dam sûng po chun LALPA tieng chun a ṭha famkim a nih.
Chun, a pain thil a lo inhlân tasahai le ama ngeiin a lo inhlân tah, tangkaruohai, rângkachak dâm, bûr le bêlhai chu LALPA inah a lâk lût a.
Chun, Asa le Israel lal Baasa chu an inlal sûng po chu an indo zing hlak a.
Israel lal Baasa chun Judahai chu a hang thawh a, Juda lal Asa kuoma lût ding le suok ding dangna dingin Rama khuo a siem a.

Chuongchun, Asa chun LALPA ina le lal ina ro la um tangkaruo le rângkachak po po chu a lâk a, a siehlawhai a pêk a; chun, lal Asa chun Damaska khuoa um Suria lal Hezion nau Tabrimon naupa Ben- hadad kuoma chun,

“Nang le keia kâra le ka pa le i pa kârah thuthlung a um a, ngai ta, lâwmman dingin tangkaruo le râng- kachak ka hung thawn che; thaw ta, Israel lal Baasa hin a min kiensanna dingin a kuoma i thuthlung kha ṭhiek el ta,” tiin a thawn a.

Chun, Benhadad chun lal Asa thu chu a lo pawm a, chuongchun, Israel khuohai chu thaw dingin a sipai hotuhai a tir a. Ijon khuo dâm, Dan khuo dâm, Abel-beth-maaka khuo dâm, Kinneroth biel po po chu, Naphtali ram po po le chun a thawh a.
Chun, Baasa chun chu thu chu a lo hriet phingleh Rama khaw siem chu a ma a, Tirza khuoa chun a um tah a.

Chuongchun, lal Asa chun Judai ram po poa chun thu ân phur vêl tah a; tukhawm a âwl bîk hrim hrim an um nawh, chuongchun, Baasain Rama khaw siemna dinga thing le lung a hmanghai chu an thak a; chuonghai chu hmangin lal Asa chun Mizpa khuo le Benjamin rama Geba khuo a siem a.

Asa chanchin dang po pohai, a thilthawtheizie po pohai, a thilthaw po pohai, a khaw siemhai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih? Ami- ruokchu, a tar hnung chun a kea chun hri ieng amanih a hung invawi tah a.
Chun, Asa chu a puhai kuomah a in tah a, a pu David khawpuiah a puhai lai chun an phûm tah a; a naupa Jehosaphat chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
Chun, Jeroboam naupa Nadab chu Juda lal Asa inlal kum hninaa chun Israelhai chungah ân lal ṭan a; Israelhai chunga chun kum hni ân lal a.
LALPA mithmuin thil ṭha naw- tak a thaw hlak a; a pa lampui hraw chu a hraw veh a, Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a suksuolna kha a thaw veh a.

Chun, Issakar sûnghai laia mi Ahija naupa Baasa chun ama chu a phier rûk a, Philistin mihai chan, Gibbethon khuoah Baasa chun a that tah a, Nadab le Israelhai po po chun Gibbethon khuo chu an inhuol lai tak a nih.
Juda lal Asa inlal a kum thumnaah a nih Baasa chun a that a, a aiah ân lal chu.

Chun, lal a hung ni phing chun a sukchimit dêr hmakhat chun Jeroboam sûnghai po po chu a that a, a dam taphawt chu pakhat khawm Jeroboam chu a hlapêk nawh a; LALPAIN Shilo khuoa mi a siehlaw Ahija hmanga a lo hril ta ang khan,
chu chu Israelhai thil insuk- suoltira a thaw, Jeroboam suolnahai lei le LALPA Israelhai Pathien chu a suklungsen lei a nih.
Nadab chanchin danghai le a thilthaw po pohai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Asa le Israel lal Baasa chu an inlal sûng po chu an indo zing hlak a.
Juda lal Asa inlal kum thumnaa chun Ahija naupa Baasa chu Tirza khuoah Israelhai po po chungah ân lal ṭan a, kum sâwmhni le kum li ân lal a.
LALPA mithmuin thil ṭhanaw- tak a thaw hlak a, Jeroboam lampui hraw chu a hraw veh a, Israelhai thil insuksuoltirnaa a suksuolna kha a thaw veh a.
